bug.author: HaoLiuHust
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:http://nnvm.tvmlang.org/tutorials/from_mxnet.html>http://nnvm.tvmlang.org/tutorials/from_mxnet.html</denchmark-link>
when run this sample in 12.0 version, below error will occur: [14:03:53] /home/liuhao/nnvm/tvm/dmlc-core/include/dmlc/logging.h:308: [14:03:53] src/top/nn/nn.cc:44: Operator dense(use_bias=True, units=1000, name=dense0) expects weight's shape to be [1000,1], but got [1000,512]. when use 11.0 or 11.1 version, it will be ok.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/apache/teams/mxnet-committers>@apache/mxnet-committers</denchmark-link> : This issue has been inactive for the past 90 days. It has no label and needs triage. For general "how-to" questions, our <denchmark-link:https://discuss.mxnet.io/>user forum</denchmark-link> (and <denchmark-link:https://discuss.gluon.ai/>Chinese version</denchmark-link> ) is a good place to get help.
Closing since the bug has already been fixed.
